short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert HTML content to Markdown format with advanced formatting support

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HTML to Markdown Converter is a powerful Chrome extension that transforms web content into clean, well-formatted Markdown text. Whether you're a content writer, developer, technical writer, or working with AI tools, this extension makes it easy to convert web content while preserving its structure and formatting.

üöÄ Key Features
‚Ä¢ Smart Content Detection: Automatically identifies and extracts the main content of any webpage ‚Ä¢ Full Page Export: Option to convert the entire webpage to Markdown ‚Ä¢ Selected Content Export: Option to convert only selected page content ‚Ä¢ Multiple Export Options: Copy to clipboard or download as .md file ‚Ä¢ GitHub Flavoured Markdown: Full support for GFM syntax ‚Ä¢ Advanced Formatting: Preserves tables, code blocks, lists, and images ‚Ä¢ Link Handling: Automatically converts relative links to absolute URLs ‚Ä¢ Clean Output: Generates clean, well-structured Markdown without clutter ‚Ä¢ Dark mode support.

üí° Perfect For
‚Ä¢ Content writers preparing articles for different platforms ‚Ä¢ Developers documenting code or writing technical content ‚Ä¢ Technical writers creating documentation ‚Ä¢ Anyone working with AI tools requiring Markdown input ‚Ä¢ Bloggers moving content between platforms ‚Ä¢ Researchers collecting web content for analysis

üõ†Ô∏è Technical Details
‚Ä¢ Supports nested lists, tables, code blocks, and images ‚Ä¢ Handles complex HTML structures ‚Ä¢ Preserves original formatting ‚Ä¢ Fast and efficient conversion ‚Ä¢ Lightweight and easy to use

üîí Privacy & Security
‚Ä¢ Works locally in your browser ‚Ä¢ No data sent to external servers ‚Ä¢ Minimal permissions required
